results.title: Triple Therapy with Telmisartan, Amlodipine, and Rosuvastatin (TAR) Versus Telmisartan/Amlodipine (TA) and Telmisartan/Rosuvastatin (TR) Combinations in Hypertension and Dyslipidemia: A Systematic Review and Meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: AIM: This study investigated the comparative efficacy and safety of a three-drug regimen (TAR) containing @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@, @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ against two-drug combinations (@<m>CHEMICAL_telmisartan_amlodipine_combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C548840 @@@TA@@@ and TR) for managing @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Dyslipidemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Habboush S, Kagita NV, Gadelmawla AF, Elmoursi A, Merza N, Abdo AA, Zahran AHM, Eldeib M, Almarghany AA, Abdelfadil MM, Abdelkarim MA, Shawky I, Mohammed OM, Alharran A, Ali MM, Elbardisy S. Triple Therapy with Telmisartan, Amlodipine, and Rosuvastatin (TAR) Versus Telmisartan/Amlodipine (TA) and Telmisartan/Rosuvastatin (TR) Combinations in Hypertension and Dyslipidemia: A Systematic Review and Meta-analysis. High Blood Press Cardiovasc Prev. 2024 Nov 19;():. PMID: 39557773
